pkgmetadata.longdescription: # mizu ðŸ’§[![Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/niconico.py)](https://pypi.org/project/niconico.py/)[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/mizu)](https://pepy.tech/project/mizu)[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/mizu/month)](https://pepy.tech/project/mizu)[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/mizu/week)](https://pepy.tech/project/mizu)[Documentation](https://tuna2134.github.io/mizu)Mizu written by rust and used [pulldown-cmark](https://github.com/raphlinus/pulldown-cmark).## Installation```shpip install mizu```Or```shpip install "mizu @ git+https://github.com/tuna2134/mizu"```## PerformanceThese performance test codes are in tests.`26ms`## ExampleBasic:```pyfrom mizu import parseparse("# Hello tuna2134")```Extension:```pyfrom mizu import parse_extparse_ext("""- [ ] test- [ ] test2""")```
